channel.title: Loads of problems
channel.description:
hey all i am having loads of problems with clients, first of all when i go to the start server thing it always says the aount is already logged on... secondly when i try to use any other client i always get the same error message:
'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .
so if anyone would be able to help it would be much appreciated ;)
oh and i am using Vista home premium 64bit, if you needed to know.
Many thanks in advance, Tom

item.title: Loads of problems
item.dc:creator: @tomtheripper tomtheripper
item.description:
@tomtheripper wrote:

okay thanks, i assume i just need to set my paths as i already have java xD but yeah ill go try that out. thanks alot![br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 10, 2009, 10:26:49 am[/size][hr]i set the paths and i am still getting the error messages
